extDescription.message: Javadoc incremental search for packages and classes.

optionsAnchor.description: Label used for the options page anchor.

autoOpenOptionTitle.description: Title of the options page section used to configure the auto-open option.

autoOpenOptionOn.description: Label displayed for the button to turn on the auto-open option.

autoOpenOptionOff.message: When the Enter key is pressed
autoOpenOptionOff.description: Label displayed for the button to turn off the auto-open option.

mergeFramesOptionTitle.description: Title of the options page section used to configure the merge frames option.

mergeFramesOptionOn.message: Merge the package list and class list
mergeFramesOptionOn.description: Label displayed next to the button to turn on the merge frames option.

mergeFramesOptionOff.message: Use separate frames for packages and classes
mergeFramesOptionOff.description: Label displayed next to the button to turn off the merge frames option.

menuOptionTitle.message: Menu displayed by pressing the @ key
menuOptionTitle.description: Title of the options page section used to configure the menus.

classOrMethodMenuOptionDescription.message: When the top search result is a class or method:
classOrMethodMenuOptionDescription.description: Label for the class/method menu configuration.

packageMenuOptionDescription.message: When the top search result is a package:
packageMenuOptionDescription.description: Label for the package menu configuration.

restoreDefault.description: Label displayed on the each button to reset a menu option to the default value.

optionsReadOnly.message: This browser does not support changing the options.
optionsReadOnly.description: Error message displayed when the options cannot be configured.
